we_should_thank_dad_for_the_useful_advic.phrase: We should thank dad for the useful advice
we_should_thank_dad_for_the_useful_advic.prompt: A father figure giving advice to grateful family members, with a glowing lightbulb above his head, surrounded by floating "Thank You" speech bubbles. in the style of a children's book illustration, Axel Scheffler style, thick brushstrokes, colored pencil texture, expressive characters, bold outlines, textured shading, earthy color palette
